original_text: The prophets that have been before me and before thee of old prophesied both against many countries, and against great kingdoms, of war, and of evil, and of pestilence.
korean_text: 나와 너 이전의 선지자들이 예로부터 많은 땅들과 큰 나라들에 대하여 전쟁과 재앙과 전염병을 예언하였느니라

sentences.original_text: The prophets that have been before me

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너보다 먼저 있었던 옛 선지자들은

sentences.original_text: of war, and of evil, and of pestilence
